1_1HiJDred9Tjdqz23kiGbPsqMAFqfpCbRYL.body:
Blood has a special meaning for Jews. In the Jewish teaching the blood is the center of soul.
In the Kabbalah, the secret Jewish teaching, God has 10 properties. (like an RPG character)
The Yesod (Connection) is Gods property. It signifies also the male sex organ on the Tree of Life from the Kabbalah.
When the rabbi sucks the blood from the penis of the baby it has a symbolic meaning.
It makes connection to God for the spirit of the child through the rabbi.
Metzitzah bâ€™peh is a holly sucking for Jews and essential for their religion.
